title: Statement from the Press Secretary Commemorating 25 Years of Diplomatic Relations between the United States and Vietnam â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
July 10, 2020
We congratulate Vietnam on an outstanding year as the Chair of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, and are excited to announce that the United States and Vietnam have reached an agreement that will bring Peace Corps volunteers to Vietnam.We celebrate the close ties forged over the last quarter century and look forward to marking the next 25 years of partnership, friendship, and a brighter future for our peoples.
